short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time from any web tool (Trello, JIRA, Google Calendar etc.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track time from any web tool without switching to a tab with Costlocker. Click on Costlocker icon in browser or press CTRL+SHIFT+T and start tracking in Costlocker popup.

We prefill description for integrated tools, e.g. Trello card, JIRA ticket. If the tool isn't yet supported, we use page title for description. You can track time from every page!
